thought: The Slack action (action_1) currently has no parameters set, which causes the error when sending the message. I will set the necessary parameters for sending a text message to the Slack channel #general, including the required 'text' param with expression to extract from input_data.
plan: Set params for action_1 with select='channel', channelId by name='general'
Set messageType='text' and text='={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text
Test sending the message to Slack
criticism: Currently, action_1 has empty params, so Slack API call fails. Setting correct params is critical for successful message sending.

tool_input.comments: Send the formatted PostgreSQL query result to Slack channel #general with proper parameters.
